message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $10500.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $9800. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
